name: Colonize: Transport Tycoon
description:
Do you like transport simulators as much as we do? Then play Colonize - a unique economic strategy game set in a space setting. Build and develop your own colony and its transport network on a distant planet. This is a relaxing simulator that will allow you to feel the spirit of freedom of space explorers.

Are you tired of the notorious railroad and shipbuilder simulators? Become the manager of your own space colony. This will allow you to plunge into the world of unusual space transport of a new era.

There are no timers inherent in such games, all buildings and improvements occur instantly. Real time transportation of goods without timers and other artificial restrictions.

Discover and explore all the biomes of the planet, enriching and developing a fleet of unique vehicles along the way, which will give you the best gaming experience.

Features:
- Build a global transportation network on your own planet.
- Develop various buildings of the colony.
- Lots of amazing vehicles.
- Unique setting and visual style.
- Explore the territory of a wild planet.
- Nothing appears just like that, everything is created from the resources available on the planet.
- An unforgettable soundtrack that will allow you to immerse deeper into the atmosphere of the game.

And much more. We are working hard to meet the needs of every player. Expect frequent updates with new content and unique mechanics.
All this in a meditative atmosphere in which you can relax and enjoy the game process!
